scope.Description: scope on which action rule will apply

conditions.Description: conditions on which alerts will be filtered

createdAt.Description: Creation time of action rule. Date-Time in ISO-8601 format.

lastModifiedAt.Description: Last updated time of action rule. Date-Time in ISO-8601 format.

status.Description: Indicates if the given action rule is enabled or disabled

values.Description: list of ARM IDs of the given scope type which will be the target of the given action rule.

targetResourceType.Description: filter alerts by target resource type

alertRuleId.Description: filter alerts by alert rule id

alertRuleName.Description: filter alerts by alert rule name

description.Description: filter alerts by alert rule description

values.Description: list of values to match for a given condition.

actionGroupId.Description: Action group to trigger if action rule matches

suppressionConfig.Description: suppression configuration for the action rule

recurrenceType.Description: Specifies when the suppression should be applied

recurrenceValues.Description: Specifies the values for recurrence pattern

alertsCount.Description: Total number of alerts in smart group

severity.Description: Severity of smart group is the highest(Sev0 >... > Sev4) severity of all the alerts in the group.

startDateTime.Description: Creation time of smart group. Date-Time in ISO-8601 format.

lastModifiedDateTime.Description: Last updated time of smart group. Date-Time in ISO-8601 format.

resources.Description: Summary of target resources in the smart group

resourceTypes.Description: Summary of target resource types in the smart group

resourceGroups.Description: Summary of target resource groups in the smart group

monitorServices.Description: Summary of monitorServices in the smart group

monitorConditions.Description: Summary of monitorConditions in the smart group

alertStates.Description: Summary of alertStates in the smart group

alertSeverities.Description: Summary of alertSeverities in the smart group

nextLink.Description: The URI to fetch the next page of alerts. Call ListNext() with this URI to fetch the next page alerts.

count.Description: Total number of items of type.

essentials.Description: This object contains consistent fields across different monitor services.

context.Description: Information specific to the monitor service that gives more contextual details about the alert.

egressConfig.Description: Config which would be used for displaying the data in portal.

severity.Description: Severity of alert Sev0 being highest and Sev4 being lowest.

signalType.Description: The type of signal the alert is based on, which could be metrics, logs or activity logs.

alertState.Description: Alert object state, which can be modified by the user.

monitorCondition.Description: Condition of the rule at the monitor service. It represents whether the underlying conditions have crossed the defined alert rule thresholds.

targetResource.Description: Target ARM resource, on which alert got created.

targetResourceName.Description: Name of the target ARM resource name, on which alert got created.

targetResourceGroup.Description: Resource group of target ARM resource, on which alert got created.

targetResourceType.Description: Resource type of target ARM resource, on which alert got created.

monitorService.Description: Monitor service on which the rule(monitor) is set.

alertRule.Description: Rule(monitor) which fired alert instance. Depending on the monitor service,  this would be ARM id or name of the rule.

sourceCreatedId.Description: Unique Id created by monitor service for each alert instance. This could be used to track the issue at the monitor service, in case of Nagios, Zabbix, SCOM etc.

smartGroupId.Description: Unique Id of the smart group

smartGroupingReason.Description: Verbose reason describing the reason why this alert instance is added to a smart group

startDateTime.Description: Creation time(ISO-8601 format) of alert instance.

lastModifiedDateTime.Description: Last modification time(ISO-8601 format) of alert instance.

monitorConditionResolvedDateTime.Description: Resolved time(ISO-8601 format) of alert instance. This will be updated when monitor service resolves the alert instance because the rule condition is no longer met.

lastModifiedUserName.Description: User who last modified the alert, in case of monitor service updates user would be 'system', otherwise name of the user.

isSuppressed.Description: Value indicating whether alert is suppressed.
